description: This Java class configures Spring Security for the application, setting up a SecurityFilterChain that disables CSRF, allows unrestricted access to the '/health' endpoint, and permits all other requests. It applies to Spring Security 6 and provides a basic security setup.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for setting up Spring Security filter chain with general access rules.

methods.name: securityFilterChain
methods.description: Defines and returns the SecurityFilterChain with security rules: disables CSRF, permits all to '/health', and allows all other requests.
